department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: curly maple stock and barrel support; flint lock with single trigger; trigger guard copper with floral and acorn decoration; stock and body unadorned; raised relief acanthus leaf at top of stock behind barrel
dimension: H.8-1/4 x W.2-3/8 x D.49-1/2 in., overall
title: Flintlock Fowling Rifle
